name: Shoot the Suits Free
description:
Ever feel like there is an endless stream of men in suits looting your pockets and life’s savings? Ever want to seek retribution and beat the bejesus out of them in some way? If so, here’s your chance.

Shoot The Suits is a fast paced game where ”Suits” are attacking from all angles looking to take every penny you have. There’s no where to run and no where to hide. It’s your mission to stand your ground & fight the suit clad hoards with every weapon at your disposal… be it a baseball bat, a rock, a grenade or an air strike… defend yourself and your savings at all cost.

Choose your battle ground… Fight them in the Mall, in the Bank, in the Office, in the Stock Market, in the Capital or even in Hell.

With unlimited waves and an ever increasing arsenal of weapons, how long can you survive the onslaught and protect your money.
